content.rendered:
Air Botswana Corporation is Botswana’s state-owned national flag carrier, with its headquarters located in Gaborone. It was founded on 1972. It operates scheduled domestic and regional flights from its main base at Sir Seretse Khama International Airport. Air Botswana has been loss-making for several years, and there have been various attempts to privatise the company, and frequent changes to the corporation’s management and board, so far without reducing the losses.

 

Air Botswana Gaborone, Botswana Address:

Phone:
267 3680900/ 267 3951921

Fax: +267 3953928

Email: sales@airbotswana.co.bw

Air Botswana Official website: https://www.airbotswana.co.bw/

Air Botswana Lost Baggage Number: +267 3688 506/556

Purchasing and Supplies: +267 3688 529/538

Sales & Reservations: +267 3680 900/3951921

Online Booking / Flight reservation: +267 310 5476

Email: e-booking@airbotswana.co.bw

Customer Relations: +267 3688 427

Creditor Enquiries: +267 3688 415/451

Debtor Enquiries: +267 3688 525/403/408/411

For assistance with any other enquiry, please use the following numbers;

Cargo: +267 3688 543/551
Operations: +267 3688 528
Engineering: +267 3688 557
GM’s office: +267 3688443
Marketing: +267 3688 419/420/426

Air Botswana Online Check-in: www.airbotswana.com/in/gb/online check-in

Check Air Botswana schedule here: www.airbotswana.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Botswana flight status here: www.airbotswana.com/in/gb/flight status
